title: DKIM Key Generator
description: Generate DKIM RSA keypairs with selectors and DNS TXT records for email authentication.

config.title: Configuration
config.selectorTooltip: Unique identifier for this DKIM key (e.g., 'default', '202412', 'mailgun')
config.domainTooltip: Domain that will use this DKIM key for signing emails
config.keySizeTooltip: RSA key size in bits. 2048-bit recommended for security, 1024-bit for compatibility

privateKey.title: Private Key
privateKey.downloadTooltip: Download private key as PEM file
privateKey.warning: Keep this private key secure. Never share it publicly or store it in version control.

publicKey.title: Public Key
publicKey.downloadTooltip: Download public key as PEM file

dns.copyTooltip: Copy DNS TXT record to clipboard
dns.exportTooltip: Download DNS record as text file

implementation.title: Implementation Notes
steps: Add the DNS TXT record to your domain's DNS configuration
Configure your mail server with the private key
Set up DKIM signing for outgoing emails
Test DKIM signatures using online validation tools
